attributes.action: get rid of the annoying, tiny 5 pence coin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has to be the most annoying coin that has ever been produced and I seriously can't believe anyone actually uses them - more like chucks them in a penny jar or like me, looses them every time you open your purse.  Isn't it about time what we purchase was rounded up to 10p, 20p and 50p and we get rid of all this annoying change??
